text: The National Centre for Writing, formerly Writers' Centre Norwich, is a literature development agency and national centre for writing based in Norwich, England. It led the successful bid for Norwich to be granted the UNESCO City of Literature title in 2012.http://www.norwichcityofliterature.org/unescocityofliterature.aspx In April 2015, the organisation moved into the historic building Dragon Hall, Norwich.http://www.dragonhall.org/_blog/Dragon_Hall_News/post/writers-centre- norwich/ ==References== == External links == * Category:Academic organisations based in the United Kingdom Category:Organisations based in Norwich Norwich
title: National Centre for Writing
